rule_set_1.name: HR & Attendance Policy
rules: [ATTENDANCE] can only be [CHECK-IN] at [LOCATION] after [TIME] 08:00.
[ATTENDANCE] can only be [CHECK-OUT] before [TIME] 22:00.
[LEAVE] can only be [REQUEST] if [AMOUNT] days is less than 30.
[LEAVE] can only be [APPROVE] by [MANAGER] role users.
[EXPENSE] can only be [SUBMIT] if [AMOUNT] is less than 1000.
[EXPENSE] can only be [APPROVE] if [AMOUNT] is less than 5000.

rule_set_2.name: Finance & Procurement Policy
rules: [EXPENSE] can only be [SUBMIT] if [AMOUNT] is less than 5000.
[EXPENSE] can only be [APPROVE] by [FINANCE_MANAGER] role users.
[PURCHASE] can only be [REQUEST] if [AMOUNT] is less than 10000.
[PURCHASE] can only be [APPROVE] if [VENDOR] is pre-approved.
[INVOICE] can only be [SUBMIT] if [DUE_DATE] is within 30 days.
[PAYMENT] can only be [PROCESS] if [INVOICE] is approved.

rule_set_3.name: IT & Security Policy
rules: [SYSTEM_ACCESS] can only be [GRANT] if [USER_ROLE] is authorized.
[DATA_EXPORT] can only be [REQUEST] if [SENSITIVITY_LEVEL] is low.
[BACKUP] can only be [SCHEDULE] during [TIME] 02:00 to 04:00.
[SECURITY_UPDATE] can only be [DEPLOY] on [DAY] weekend.
[VPN_ACCESS] can only be [ENABLE] from [LOCATION] approved countries.
[API_ACCESS] can only be [GRANT] if [RATE_LIMIT] is configured.

rule_set_4.name: Project Management Policy
rules: [TASK] can only be [ASSIGN] if [PRIORITY] is set.
[MILESTONE] can only be [CREATE] if [DEADLINE] is realistic.
[RESOURCE] can only be [ALLOCATE] if [AVAILABILITY] is confirmed.
[BUDGET] can only be [APPROVE] if [AMOUNT] is within limits.
[RISK] can only be [MITIGATE] if [IMPACT] is assessed.
[DELIVERABLE] can only be [SUBMIT] if [QUALITY_CHECK] is passed.
